frontmatter.title: About
frontmatter.author: James
frontmatter.excerpt: I'm a full-stack developer based in Toronto, Canada. Over the last couple of years, I have been working for companies such as Indeed and clients to create, maintain and customize websites and software.

markdownRemark.html:
Hello

I'm a co-founder and full-stack developer specialized in developing new service and software for personal and corporate clients.

With experience in languages such as JavaScript, Node.js, Python and Java along with relevant frameworks from React to Django, I have written codes for the clients, and I have been honoured to be a part of websites and applications that are used by thousands of people in the world every day.

Knowing and understanding contemporary cloud solutions like Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) are getting important to every developer to deliver production-ready software. I also learn new relevant skills daily, and I am excited to see what I will be able to create with others in the future.

If you have any question about my work or wonder how our company's services would help you and your business, please contact anytime via my LinkedIn profile

Projects

  • Chy Square

    • Chy Square is a service that helps you find the best and coolest home and neighbourhood.

  • Averagenie

    • Averagenie is the genie in a-verage. Averagenie platform shows and shares the average values that people are interested in.

  • Unlyst

    • A website and python app that searches more than 6,000 active development applications in Toronto and sends subscribers around 4,000 notification emails every week.

  • Han Translations

    • Han Translations is the only translation and interpreting company in Belgium that directly provides Korean translation and interpreting services.

  • Han Copywriting

    • Steffie Vandelacluze, the owner of Han Translations, is also running Han Copywriting that provides copywriting service in English and Dutch for the clients in the world.

  • Hyra - Hire Your Receipt Analyst

    • Hyra, Hire Your Receipt Analyst, is the developing money management software, expense, income and transfer tracker that you can easily use in your iPhone.

  • AutoAdmin

    • Python app made with python libraries including pdfminer, PyPDF2, and openpyxl to extract information related to a client from pdf files and send a notification email to the client.

Skills

Websites

  • Frontend: CSS, HTML, JavaScript
  • Tools: Bootstrap, Gatsby, MaterialUI, React, Wordpress
  • Backend: Java, Node.js, Python
  • Cloud: AWS, Azure, Firebase, Vercel

APIs

  • Geospatial: Google Maps, Mapbox
  • Auth0
  • Finance: Alpha Vantage, Bitpay, Stripe

Data

  • Database design: CosmosDB, MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL
  • Data scraping: Selenium
